name: Logy – The New Era Of Login / Registration With Social Login & Limit Login Attempts & Captcha
author: Youssef Kaine

sections.description:
Logy is a Secure & Advanced Login / Registration / Reset Password System with an Elegant Responsive Design and many Powerful features like Social Login, Limit Login Attempts, Captcha and more … Extremely Customizable and a bunch of other features Provided By KaineLabs.

__ Logy Page

http://www.kainelabs.com/logy

__ Features

  • # Front-End Login/Registration/Reset Password Pages
  • # Social Login ( Facebook, Twitter, Google, Instagram, LinkedIn )
  • # Limit Login Attempts
  • # Hide Dashboard & Toolbar For Normal Users
  • # Create+240 Different Login Form
  • # Create +140 Different Registration Form
  • # Manage Admin Notifications
  • # Customize User Notification Emails
  • # Controle After Login / Logout Redirection ( Users / Admins )
  • # Advanced Login/Registration Widgets
  • # Login/Registration/Reset Password Shortcodes
  • # Registration Role Assignment
  • # Advanced Captcha System ( Google Recaptcha )
  • # Customize All Forms Styling
  • # Clean & Clear Design
  • # Fully Responsive Design
  • # Enable/Disable Registration Page
  • # Registration Role Assignment
  • # AND A BUNCH Of UNTOLD FEATURES …

__ Admin Panel Features

  • # Over +200 Panel Options
  • # +10 Options Tabs
  • # 09 Color Schemes
  • # Fully Responsive Design
  • # Ajaxed Panel ( No Refresh Required )

__ Forms Styling Features

  • # 12 Input Styles
  • # 10 Button Styles
  • # 02 Form Headers Styles
  • # Customize Buttons Text
  • # Customize Forms Styling
  • # Customize Forms Header Text
  • # 03 Input Border Styles( Flat, Radius, Rounded )
  • # 03 Buttons Border Styles( Flat, Radius, Rounded )
  • # 02 Input Icons Alignment Options ( Left, Right )

__ Extra Features

  • # WPML Ready
  • # Fully Translatable
  • # Cross-Browser Compatibility
  • # Detailed Documentation
  • # Well Commented Code
  • # Clean & Well Organized Code
  • # Built Using WordPress Best Practices
  • # No Plugins Required
  • # Built Without Frameworks
  • # Lifetime Free Updates
sections.installation:
• 1 – Go to the WordPress admin panel and then navigate to Plugins > Add New > Upload .
  • 2 – Choose the Logy plugin zip .
  • 3 – Wait untill the installation process ends .
  • 4 – Congratulations you are ready to start a new journey with logy.

Set Up Logy Pages

Once You Install Logy, 3 Pages Will Be added Automatically to your website : ( Login, Register, Lost Password )

  • 1 – Go To Appearance > Menus.
  • 2 – Add “Login” to your website navigation menu.
  • 3 – After you click on the “Add To Menu” Button. they will be added to the Menu Structure.

Note: The login page will be named “Logout” for logged-in Users.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • 1 – Go to the WordPress admin panel and then navigate to Plugins > Add New > Upload .
  • 2 – Choose the Logy plugin zip .
  • 3 – Wait untill the installation process ends .
  • 4 – Congratulations you are ready to start a new journey with logy.

Set Up Logy Pages

Once You Install Logy, 3 Pages Will Be added Automatically to your website : ( Login, Register, Lost Password )

  • 1 – Go To Appearance > Menus.
  • 2 – Add “Login” to your website navigation menu.
  • 3 – After you click on the “Add To Menu” Button. they will be added to the Menu Structure.

Note: The login page will be named “Logout” for logged-in Users.
